articles.title: GPU prices are coming down, finally – gamers rejoice, but there’s more to come - Business Insider India
articles.description:

articles.content: GPU prices are finally coming down after being stuck in an upward trajectory for the past year or so. According to prices on various Indian retailers, and more widely, around the world, GPU prices ha… [+2454 chars]
